Private and Reliable Transactions, Communications, and Publishing

Zen is leveraging the best minds in technology, governance, and community building to create the world’s first private, distributed, and reliable platform for communications, transactions, and publishing.

Private Transactions

ZenCash has the ability to use transparent and shielded transactions for blockchain based commerce.

Transparent from the Bitcoin blockchain heritage.

Shielded transactions using zk-SNARKS from Zcash.

Private Communications

Private communications on the ZenCash blockchain ensures no metadata leakage regarding transaction specifics.

Distributed and Secure Nodes relay communications in a non-trackable way.

Secure and private communications with custom client application fully utilize the secure memo capabilities of shielded transactions.

Secure and Anonymous Publishing

End-user applications provide one-to-many private communications on blockchain.

Secure messaging provides for publishing on the InterPlanetary File System.

Distributed publishing and distributed messaging enables worldwide anonymous communications.

Commerce and Communications for All

Zen is leveraging a global community to build a private and secure platform for instantaneous communications and transactions.

Permanent
Globally Distributed
Private

Designed for the World, and for the Future

Focusing on users and usability, ZenCash features:

International documentation and wallets in many languages
Global governance with inclusive decision making
Reliable funding for continuous improvement

Secure Nodes Provide International Resilience

Zen is leveraging a global community to build a private and secure platform for instantaneous communications and transactions.

Zen Secure Nodes form the foundation of a distributed and resilient network for accessibility and usability anywhere in the world.

Secure Nodes will enable fully encrypted communications and network obfuscation so end-user activity is protected.

Funding for Continuous Operations and Development

The ZenCash Treasury fund is generated by 8.5% of each block mining reward and is used for operations, development, and getting out the message of Zen to the World.

Treasury funds are held in trust and allocated by the Zen Blockchain Foundation, a non-profit entity entrusted with growing and maintaining the Zen ecosystem.

Zen Secure Node operations is encouraged and funded by a 3.5% redirection of block mining reward.

Promoting the Value of Individual Privacy Worldwide

Our platform will be managed through an inclusive, global distribution of decision-making authority and collaborative effort.

We live in an information-based society where individuals outsource management of their most private data, unaware that their data HAS VALUE and that its security IS IMPORTANT.

We’re working to build infrastructure that users can use trust to secure and store their wealth, identification data, communications, and transactions.

Communicate Any Type or Size of Information

Zen private messaging integrates with IPFS (https://ipfs.io/) for distributed publishing and information access.

IPFS is the Distributed Web. A peer-to-peer hypermedia protocol to make the web faster, safer, and more open.

Any type of information in multiple formats can be published to IPFS, then linked to and messaged by Zen private and secure communications.

Integrating with IPFS Helps Build the Internet’s Next Web

IPFS remains true to the original vision of the open and flat web, and delivers the technology which makes that vision a reality.

IPFS powers the creation of diversely resilient networks which enable persistent availability with or without Internet backbone connectivity.

IPFS provides historic versioning (like git) and makes it simple to set up resilient networks for mirroring of data.

ZenCash Team

ZenCash founders and team come from a wide variety of backgrounds and experience, and are dedicated to empowering individuals worldwide.

Rob Viglione

ECONOMIST

Read More

Rob is a former physicist and mathematician with experience working on Bitshares, BlockPay, Zclassic, Seasteading and Bitgate. He's currently a PhD Candidate in Finance researching cryptofinance and teaching “Bitcoin & Blockchain Applications in Finance."

Rob holds an MBA in Finance & Marketing and the PMP certification. He is a passionate libertarian who advocates peace, freedom, and respect for individual life.

Rolf Versluis

BUSINESS OPERATIONS

Read More

Rolf is an experienced business owner in the IT industry and owns a mid-size mining operation.

With prior experience at Cisco systems, the semiconductor industry, and as a nuclear trained officer in the US Submarine force, Rolf brings leadership, management, and technical operational expertise to the Zen organization.

Jane Lippencott

ASIA OPERATIONS

Read More

Jane is a budding entrepreneur with active projects in Asia & Africa who is passionate about community building & financial inclusion. Her experience ranges from financial analysis in asset & wealth management to marketing, strategy, innovation, & partnerships in venture capital & FinTech startups. She is currently pursuing degrees in international business, data analytics, & finance, & is based in Asia.

Carlo Vicari

BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT

Read More

Carlo has deep experience building cryptocurrency communities, and heads community management for IOHK and has been a regular contributor to Ethereum Classic. His background includes planning growth strategies, implementing cohesive social media campaigns, and facilitating project visibility and credibility.

Steven Nerayoff

STRATEGIC ADVISOR

Read More

Steven is an entrepreneur, disruptor, and venture capitalist interested in smart cities, technology startups, and blockchain. He has tremendous industry experience supporting Ethereum, Lisk, and Zcash. Steve is also the Founder of CloudParc, a disruptive smart-city platform using machine vision and AI.

Charles Hoskinson

STRATEGIC ADVISOR

Read More

Charles is the CEO of IOHK, the blockchain industry’s leading R&D firm. He is a technology entrepreneur and mathematician, co-founder of Bitshares, Ethereum, and IOHK. Charles was the founding chairman of the Bitcoin Foundation’s education committee and established the Cryptocurrency Research Group in September of 2013. His current projects focus on education of cryptocurrency topics, evangelism of decentralization and making cryptographic tools easier to use for the mainstream.

William Wolf

CORE TECHNICAL TEAM

Read More

Professional developer/engineer for 12+ years, currently leading payments engineering team at Airbnb. Will has worked on the founding teams of several startups, grown and managed engineering teams from 1 to 30+, built scalable high-volume web-based email hosting solutions, a distributed, scalable cloud computing platform called OpenStack, and global payments systems and infrastructure. Will has been involved in Bitcoin and the crypto space since 2011 and has made contributions to many open source blockchain tools, libraries, and systems.

Lukáš Bureš

CORE TECHNICAL TEAM

Read More

Lukáš is currently a PhD candidate in cybernetics at the University of West Bohemia and teaching “Computer Vision Methods,” and has an MSc in Cybernetics. He has interests in cryptocurrency, artificial intelligence, security, machine learning, data mining, and computer vision. Lukáš is fully proficiency in many programming languages and with many development libraries and tools.

Jake Tarren

CORE TECHNICAL TEAM

Read More

Jake is a volunteer with the development team. He's currently heading up the communications and outreach for the dev team, and plans on taking on more development intensive roles. His day job is a Red Team Engineer at NASA, where he routinely breaks things.

Mike Lorey

CORE TECHNICAL TEAM

Read More

Mike is a notable software engineer, marketing technologist, and social entrepreneur. His focus lies at the intersection between raw creative and technical skills, bending the conceptual into the tangible things that other people want or need.

Mike holds an MBA in Marketing and is a self-taught programmer.

He'll be supporting the Dev Team with creating and running a continuous deployment pipeline and make sure the infrastructure keeps running. He's passionate about privacy in the digital age and prefers to stay pseudonymous.

Gustavo Fialho

Read More

Gustavo is a web developer and entrepreneur with extensive experience supporting cryptocurrency projects. When not in front of a computer he can be found cycling up hills sporting his Pantani Jersey. He believes life should be kept simple and enjoys helping others.

Rosario Pabst

PROJECT MANAGER | OPERATIONS

Read More

She has demonstrated expertise in all aspects of project management, leading cross-functional teams, and implementing both Agile and Lean methods. Rosario has a M.S. in Systems Engineering and the PMP certification.

Simran Dhillon

CREATIVE DIRECTOR

Read More

He formerly used to work as an Analyst at GS Investment Banking Division (IBD).
